items.sentence: Tom walked out the door without saying goodbye.
I have to be absent from school for the moment.
I haven\'t needed to use the money you lent me.
I haven\'t played the clarinet for a long time.
I haven\'t seen one of these since I was a kid.
I don\'t know whether Tom speaks French or not.
Tom pretended not to hear what Mary was saying.
Tom was the most handsome man at Mary\'s party.
I bumped into Tom in the supermarket yesterday.
I can see Tom outside standing on the sidewalk.
